name: Aganorsa Leaf - Signature Selection - Corojo - Torpedo (109 Head)
additionalNotes:
The Aganorsa farm has long been growing and cultivating premium Nicaraguan tobaccos. Indeed, if you’ve been around the block here a few times, you’ve likely enjoyed cigars featuring their tobaccos without even knowing. That’s why we were stoked when Aganorsa announced they’d be creating their 
Aged for a total of seven long years, each Aganorsa Leaf Signature Selection offers a rotund and unique cigar experience. That’s thanks to the small amount of medio tempo leaf included in each cigar. To put it in layman’s terms, this tobacco is a cigar nerd’s dream – super flavorful, balanced, and incredibly rare. Additionally, you’ll find a Rosado claro Corojo ’99 wrapper leaf overtop Criollo ’98 and Corojo ’99 long-fillers. Rich, sweet, and spicy, the Aganorsa Leaf Signature Selection is the full package.
